com.github.webapp_minifier.replacer

Interface NodeHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTagHandler

    public interface NodeHandler
    Handler for nodes in an HTML document.
    Author:
    Lonny
     

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void complete()
      Indicates that parsing of the current file has completed.

      Returns the minification summary.

      Handles the comment.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start(File file)
        Indicates that the given file is about to be parsed.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be parsed.

      • handleComment

        boolean handleComment(String text)
                      throws ParseOptionException
        Handles the comment.
        Parameters:
        text - the comment's text.
        Returns:
        true if the comment should be deleted. false to keep the comment.
        Throws:
        ParseOptionException - if an error occurs while parsing options from the comment.

      • handleExternalCss

        String handleExternalCss(String url)
                         throws IOException
        Handles the external CSS.
        Parameters:
        url - the location of the external CSS.
        Returns:
        the new value for the href attribute or null to delete the entire link element.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an unexpected I/O error occurs.

      • handleEmbeddedCss

        String handleEmbeddedCss(String text,
                       boolean scoped)
                         throws IOException
        Handles the embedded CSS.
        Parameters:
        text - the embedded CSS.
        scoped - indicates if the embedded CSS was scoped.
        Returns:
        the new value for the embedded CSS or null to delete it.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an unexpected I/O error occurs.

      • handleExternalJs

        String handleExternalJs(String url)
                        throws IOException
        Handles the external JavaScript.
        Parameters:
        url - the location of the external JavaScript.
        Returns:
        the new value for the src attribute or null to delete the entire script element.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an unexpected I/O error occurs.

      • handleEmbeddedJs

        String handleEmbeddedJs(String text)
                        throws IOException
        Handles the embedded JavaScript.
        Parameters:
        text - the embedded JavaScript.
        Returns:
        the new value for the embedded JavaScript or null to delete it.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an unexpected I/O error occurs.

      • handleText

        void handleText(String text)
        Handles the text value.
        Parameters:
        text - the text content.

      • handleOther

        void handleOther(String nodeName)
        Handles any other type of node in the document.
        Parameters:
        nodeName - the node name.

      • complete

        void complete()
        Indicates that parsing of the current file has completed.

        Returns the minification summary.

        the summary.
